name: Rust, Lust and Broken Trust: A Steel Love Story
name_original: Rust, Lust and Broken Trust: A Steel Love Story
description:
An entry to the Robot Party Jam 2022

In book 6 of the beloved Steel Love YA series, Aldious Ripley was killed by The Mayor. Now, after being in suspended animation for 10 years, much of the world has changed. But not his desire for revenge. 

In this Adventure RPG, play as the revived inventor as he travels across the galaxy to recruit allies, upgrade his weapons, and find the tools he needs to either confront the one who killed him, or finish what was started.

Featuring:

  • Three different cool abilities to choose from
  • Two separate endings
  • An optional boss fight against a mysterious jester

------------
Controls
------------
Use the Arrow keys to move
Hold Shift to run
Interact with Enter or Space
Access the menu with ESC
